data.actual_result: Message sends, message box still contains message.
data.expected_result: Message sends, message box is cleared of text.
data.short_description: Text stays in message box, allowing for large spam messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an image using the paperclip - Hold on the image you sent - Click on "Edit Message" from the menu - type in the message box, and then click "Save" - "Save" button is replaced by "Send", click it and the message will be sent, with the message box still open.
